sys_ux_client_script.name: Clear Reset Timeout

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_5686f304eb9e4a5036e7f734bad0cdc2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Home Stylized">ca863304eb9e4a5036e7f734bad0cd0f</macroponent><name>Clear Reset Timeout</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api : { setState, state : { timeoutId}}, event, helpers : {timing : {clearTimeout}}, imports}) {
    if(timeoutId){
        clearTimeout(timeoutId);
        setState("timeoutId", "");
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jon.lind</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-16 18:46:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>5686f304eb9e4a5036e7f734bad0cdc2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Clear Reset Timeout</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Photobooth App" source="x_snc_pb_app">baa73cb74742dd10552caf52736d43f1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Photobooth App">baa73cb74742dd10552caf52736d43f1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_5686f304eb9e4a5036e7f734bad0cdc2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jon.lind</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-16 18:46:06</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
